version_description: Bugfixing
Barcode optimizing, small bugfixes

Thanks for all your feedback! These are the new functions: optimized check mark for your winning numbers, scan of the WestLotto-Card and Basis-Card and integration in our ShopPlay-Function, additional new view of your ticket list, navigation to your next WestLotto-Shop. Play it your way!
Bugfix: Login available again :-)

- New add-on for GlücksSpirale: "Die Sieger-Chance"
- Spiel 77, SUPER 6, GlücksSpirale and Die Sieger-Chance now also available for Eurojackpot
- Get your own WestLotto-customercard
- Quicker spot on your winnings
Bugfix: Scan of Basiskarte and settings for notifications functional again
Bug fixes

The product "GlücksSpirale-Jahreslos" is no longer available for this app, but there's still the opportunity to play "GlücksSpirale" for 26 weeks. Furthermore the function "predating" has been removed for simplification of design.

Bugfixing: the draw 31.12.2016 is available again.
3.2.5: The product "GlücksSpirale-Jahreslos" is no longer available for this app, but there's still the opportunity to play "GlücksSpirale" for 26 weeks. Furthermore the function "predating" has been removed for simplification of design.
Bugfix: Winning numbers from draw 31.12.2016 are presented correctly now.
usability optimization

* New: basket
* New: QuickPlay
* Improvement, e. g. play ShopPlay without internet-connection
* Bug-fixing

* New: Eurojackpot-SystemTipp
* New: GlücksSpirale Jahreslos
* Improvement
